name: Press the Key
description:
1. Timed Play : You have a couple of seconds to be the most accurate on typing the keyboard letters as they are shown on screen.
  2. How Far Can You Go? : One mistake, and you're out!
  3. We're DOOOOOOOOOMED : This mode you'll have to guess which letter corresponds to keycode shown on screen.
There's a kind of easter egg on the game, if you find it, let me know :)

Hope you guys like it, anything you can comment below!

Install instructions
  • Download .ZIP
  • Extract all
  • Run .EXE

Thank you so much.
